Code DocumentationÔÉÅ

Each of the Phases in the research architecture is divided into a packages within streamline which can be run independently or run together using the runners package.

The API documentation for each of them is given below for complementing further development with STREAMLINE.

  • streamline package
    • Subpackages
      • streamline.dataprep package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.featurefns package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.modeling package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.models package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.postanalysis package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.runners package
        • Submodules
      • streamline.utils package
        • Submodules
